main event: Three glowing objects were reported traveling at tremendous speed across the sky in Ionia, Michigan on 20 September 1954.
interesting points: The objects were observed flying at an extreme height., There was no radar contact with the objects according to air defense officials., Witnesses included amateur astronomers Clarke Burgeon and William McLaughlin., The report concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation., This incident was documented in a Project Blue Book report.
sighted object: three glowing objects in the sky
